item.title: Shell Error Debug
item.description: Today I encountered the following error while writing a shell script: line 225: unexpected EOF while looking for matching \`”‘ line 233: syntax error: unexpected end of file I see the " are matched after checked the codes seriously. The codes of number line 225 is: if [ ${options} = "ALL" ]; then Obviously reported wrong line. It’s hardto see the error line by line as there is a lot of codes in the front.
